content.rendered:
The Genesis community is awesome.

But with so much awesome going on (in Facebook, Slack, Twitter and elsewhere) it can be a little hard to keep up.

So I created GenesisWP.guide to try to bring together all the best things I could find in the Genesis community and try to make a curated home for all the best stuff going on within it.

Today I’m starting things off with a simple round-up of things that have caught my eye in the Genesis community this week, in a creatively titled article called This Week in Genesis.

Beyond that I’d like to add more features and cool stuff to this site, but if being in business has taught me anything, it’s that it’s easier to take things step by step (I believe some chap called Brian Gardner wrote about that too) so I’ll be starting lean and seeing where things go.

In the meantime, thank you for stopping by and if you’ve got a question or suggestion, you know where to find me 🙂

Let’s keep the awesome going.
